# Documentation for scw account
This API allows to manage your scaleway account
  
- [Manage your Scaleway SSH keys]("#Manage your Scaleway SSH keys")
  - [Add a SSH key to your Scaleway account]("#ssh-key-add")
  - [Get SSH key details]("#ssh-key-get")
  - [Initialize SSH key]("#ssh-key-init")
  - [List all SSH keys]("#ssh-key-list")
  - [Remove a SSH key from your Scaleway account]("#ssh-key-remove")
  - [Update an SSH key]("#ssh-key-update")

  
## Manage your Scaleway SSH keys

Manage your Scaleway SSH keys.


### Add a SSH key to your Scaleway account

Add a SSH key to your Scaleway account.

**Usage:**
```
scw account ssh-key add [arg=value ...]
```


**Args:**
| Name |   | Description |
| ---- | - | ----------- |
| name |  | The name of the SSH key |
| public-key | Required | SSH public key. Currently ssh-rsa, ssh-dss (DSA), ssh-ed25519 and ecdsa keys with NIST curves are supported |
| project-id |  | Project owning the resource |
| organization-id |  | Organization ID to use. If none is passed will use default organization ID from the config |


**Examples:**

Add a given ssh key
```
scw account ssh-key add name=foobar public_key="$(cat <path/to/your/public/key>)"
```




### Get SSH key details

Get SSH key details.

**Usage:**
```
scw account ssh-key get <ssh-key-id ...> [arg=value ...]
```


**Args:**
| Name |   | Description |
| ---- | - | ----------- |
| ssh-key-id | Required | The ID of the SSH key |



### Initialize SSH key

Initialize SSH key.

**Usage:**
```
scw account ssh-key init
```



### List all SSH keys

List all SSH keys.

**Usage:**
```
scw account ssh-key list [arg=value ...]
```


**Args:**
| Name |   | Description |
| ---- | - | ----------- |
| order-by | One of: `created_at_asc`, `created_at_desc`, `updated_at_asc`, `updated_at_desc`, `name_asc`, `name_desc` |  |
| name |  |  |
| project-id |  |  |
| organization-id |  |  |



### Remove a SSH key from your Scaleway account

Remove a SSH key from your Scaleway account.

**Usage:**
```
scw account ssh-key remove <ssh-key-id ...> [arg=value ...]
```


**Args:**
| Name |   | Description |
| ---- | - | ----------- |
| ssh-key-id | Required |  |


**Examples:**

Remove a given SSH key
```
scw account ssh-key remove 11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111
```




### Update an SSH key

Update an SSH key.

**Usage:**
```
scw account ssh-key update <ssh-key-id ...> [arg=value ...]
```


**Args:**
| Name |   | Description |
| ---- | - | ----------- |
| ssh-key-id | Required |  |
| name |  |  |
